introduction: In this video, we explore the exciting field of computer graphics and visualization. The Geo Delta Computer Graphics and Visualization Group at the University focuses on four main areas: technology, geometry processing, rendering techniques, and medical or data visualization. The course covers a range of topics, including data analysis, compression techniques, and visual analytics. The presenter provides insights into how these topics work and how they can be applied to various projects in the field.

sections.title: Section 1: Overview of Computer Graphics and Visualization
content: Introduction to the field of computer graphics and visualization.
Explanation of the four main areas of focus within the group: technology, geometry processing, rendering techniques, and medical or data visualization.
Discussion of the importance of dealing with large-scale data sets and the challenges they present.
Overview of the course and its objectives.

sections.title: Section 2: Technology in Computer Graphics and Visualization
content: Explanation of the technology used in computer graphics and visualization, including hardware and software.
Discussion of the evolution of computer-generated imagery and its applications.
Overview of the different types of data sets used in the field.
Explanation of the importance of data analysis in computer graphics and visualization.
topics: Technology in Computer Graphics and Visualization
Data Sets in Computer Graphics and Visualization

sections.title: Section 3: Geometry Processing in Computer Graphics and Visualization
content: Explanation of geometry processing techniques used in computer graphics and visualization.
Discussion of the importance of understanding the relationships between data points in high-dimensional data sets.
Overview of the different types of embedding techniques used in the field.
Explanation of the role of user interaction in computer graphics and visualization.

sections.title: Section 4: Rendering Techniques in Computer Graphics and Visualization
content: Explanation of rendering techniques used in computer graphics and visualization.
Discussion of the different types of rendering systems and their applications.
Overview of the role of visual analytics in computer graphics and visualization.
Explanation of the importance of perceptual methods in computer graphics and visualization.

sections.title: Section 5: Medical and Data Visualization in Computer Graphics and Visualization
content: Explanation of medical and data visualization techniques used in computer graphics and visualization.
Discussion of the importance of simplification and animation in medical visualization.
Overview of the different types of data visualization techniques used in the field.
Explanation of the role of new display technology in computer graphics and visualization.
